Articles.Content:
The Kerussians have been threatening us, So Built A ICBM And bomb their Space Center!

Rules

Pics

HAVE FUN!

Edited August 27, 2012 by mnnm1234
You realize that there are a lot of Russian users on here, right?
Yeah, you should have picked a more acceptable enemy, like North Kerea.

Well, this is all in fun- and it's not like both sides didn't practice the same thing.

Seriously, there has to be a level of 'professional respect' in the humor; but that doesn't mean that both sides can't enjoy the challenge.

And what kind of challenge is MechJabing anything? MANUALLY FLY THAT ICBM!!!

The Kerussians have been threatening us, So Built A ICBM And bomb their Space Center!

Rules

Pics

HAVE FUN!

This might be considered as offensive.

I have to agree, we have a lot of Russian members here who must be tired of the cold war/anti communist nonsense of American culture, I know I would be.

Plus you have posted no rules or pics, and this challenge is neither well thought out or executed, we are forced to assume you mean the abandoned space center but you give no details.

This thread will be closed, if you want to post another challenge, please consider our Russian members first, and our Chinese and Korean as well for that matter.
